Items.Title: Resolution in support of the creation and presentation of a ticker-tape parade to honor the veterans of the Iraq and Afghanistan wars.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Support of the creation and presentation of a ticker-tape parade to honor the veterans of the Iraq and Afghanistan wars.

Items.Title: Resolution urging Congress to pass and the President to sign H.R.1726 and S.1174, to award a Congressional Gold Medal to the 65th Infantry Regiment, known as Borinqueneers.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Award a Congressional Gold Medal to the 65th Infantry Regiment, known as Borinqueneers. (H.R.1726/S.1174)

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign, S.4714 and A.6974, legislation that would allow credit to members of the public retirement systems of New York State for military service.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allow credit to members of the public retirement systems of NYS for military service. (S.4714 and A.6974)
